Class ExtensionUtils

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.utils.ExtensionUtils
public final class ExtensionUtils extends Object
Utilities for reading and handling extensions.

  • Method Details

    • getCoreExtensions

      public static Stream<org.apache.maven.model.Extension> getCoreExtensions(org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project) throws IOException, XMLStreamException
      Reads the core extensions configured for the given project from the ${project}/.mvn/extensions.xml file.
      Parameters:
      project - MavenProject instance
      Returns:
      stream of core extensions defined in the ${project}/.mvn/extensions.xml file
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if a file I/O operation fails
      XMLStreamException - thrown if the file cannot be parsed
      Since:
      2.15.0

    • getBuildExtensions

      public static Stream<org.apache.maven.model.Extension> getBuildExtensions(org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project, org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log, boolean interpolateProperties) throws XMLStreamException, IOException, TransformerException
      Returns a stream of build extensions configured for the given project
      Parameters:
      project - MavenProject instance
      log - Log instance
      interpolateProperties - when false, will return extensions based on raw model, otherwise will process the interpolated model
      Returns:
      stream of build extensions
      Throws:
      IOException - if the model file can't be read
      XMLStreamException - if the model file can't be parsed
      TransformerException - if the model file can't be parsed
